title: RDP to Server 2012 R2 Core Fails using mRemoteNG but works with MS RDP client
author: KyferEz
body_snippet:
Server 2012 R2 Core (no GUI) RDP fails when using mRemoteNG. However it works fine using MS RDP.

<!-- Bug -->
|||
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows Server 2012 R2 x64 Core |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75 hotfix 1 Stable  |


I captured working vs nonworking traces. See screenshots. mRemoteNG is on 192.168.1.220 and the machine we are connecting to is 192.168.4.230. It looks like the mRemoteNG receives an ACK at packet 13 and then never sends any data. mRemoteNG then waits 19.9 seconds a...

comments.snippet: Did you ever get a resolution to this? I know I have figured it out before, but I can't for the life of me remember what I did to make mRemoteNG work with these 2012 servers.
comments.author: vgullotta

comments.snippet:
Upgrading mRemote seemed to fix the issue.

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.2
